Text: This is awesome. Will you be posting the rest as they air?

Only if I can find then elsewhere online.  This took forever to find.  The first 4 specials come out as a DVD box set on June 11th, 2013...so look for rips to show up online somewhere around that date.
Please do keep trying to find these! They're not airing in Canada :( And thanks so much for this one. He was one of my favourite pre-9 Doctors. A bit hammy, but a great actor and Doctor.
